mapper.select: select content_id, content_type_id, title, addr1, addr2, zipcode,tel, first_image, first_image2, readcount, sido_code, gugun_code, latitude, longitude, mlevel FROM ( SELECT content_id, content_type_id, title, addr1, addr2, zipcode,tel, first_image, first_image2, readcount, sido_code, gugun_code, latitude, longitude, mlevel, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY content_type_id ORDER BY RAND()) as row_num FROM attraction_info WHERE (6371*acos(cos(radians(#{mapxLat}))*cos(radians(latitude))*cos(radians(longitude) - radians(#{mapyLon}))+sin(radians(#{mapxLat}))*sin(radians(latitude)))) < 1 AND content_type_id IN (12,14,15,38,39) ) AS ranked_attractions WHERE row_num = 1 order by content_type_id
